about_the_game:
Mansion Restorator

Description:

Step into the world of "Mansion Restorator," the ultimate house flipper simulator where you transform neglected houses into stunning homes. Your journey begins in a bustling city filled with abandoned properties just waiting for your expert touch. Buy these run-down houses, roll up your sleeves, and get to work!

Key Features:


  • Buy and Sell:
 Scout for the best deals on abandoned houses in the city. Purchase properties at a bargain, then sell them for a profit by choosing the most lucrative offers.

  • Renovate and Remodel:
 Clean out debris, repair structural damage, and select the finest materials for renovation. Whether it’s a cozy cottage or a grand mansion, every property is a blank canvas for your creativity.

  • Decorate:
 Choose from an extensive catalog of furniture and decorations to furnish each home. From modern minimalism to classic elegance, create spaces that buyers will love.

  • Maximize Profits:
 Strategize your sales to get the best offers. Use your profits to reinvest in more properties, or save up to purchase and renovate the mansion of your dreams.

  • Dream Mansion:
 With enough success, buy and restore your ultimate dream mansion. Design every detail to suit your taste in the luxurious home you’ve always envisioned.

Embark on a rewarding journey where your renovation skills can turn forgotten houses into desirable homes. Profit from your hard work and eventually create the perfect mansion to call your own. "Mansion Restorator" is not just a game, it’s your chance to build a legacy in real estate!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Become a one-person house flipper. Buy, repair, and renovate neglected mansions. Restore these grand estates to their former glory and sell them for a profit
supported_languages: English, Russian, Ukrainian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Vietnamese
